welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zaragoza, Guatemala! Get ready to be enchanted by the charm of this beautiful city, known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Zaragoza has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"
